title: Cox's Bazar Tour
description: This 4-day tour will take you to the world's longest beachfront, Cox's Bazar. You'll also visit the Himchari Hills, Inani Beach, and St. Martin's Island.

activities: Arrive in Cox's Bazar and check into your hotel.
Relax on the beach and enjoy the sunset.
Visit the Himchari Hills and enjoy the panoramic views of the beach.
Go for a swim in the Inani Beach.
Take a boat trip to St. Martin's Island, a beautiful island with white sand beaches and crystal-clear waters.
Go snorkeling or diving and explore the underwater world.
Relax on the beach and enjoy your last day in Cox's Bazar.
Depart from Cox's Bazar.

reviews.author: John Doe
reviews.comment: This was an amazing tour! Cox's Bazar is a beautiful place and the itinerary was perfect. We saw so much and had a lot of fun.

reviews.author: Jane Doe
reviews.comment: Overall, this was a good tour. The guide was knowledgeable and the itinerary was interesting. However, I felt that the accommodations could have been better.

title: Sundarbans Tour
description: This 3-day tour will take you to the Sundarbans, the world's largest mangrove forest. You'll have the chance to see Royal Bengal tigers, crocodiles, and other wildlife.

activities: Arrive in the Sundarbans and check into your hotel.
Take a boat trip into the forest and see the wildlife.
Visit a local village and learn about the culture of the people who live in the Sundarbans.
Go for a morning boat trip and see the sunrise over the forest.
Visit a crocodile breeding center and learn about the conservation of crocodiles.
Take a walk through the forest and see the different types of mangroves.
Go for a final boat trip and see the wildlife.
Depart from the Sundarbans.

reviews.author: David Smith
reviews.comment: This was an incredible tour! I saw so many amazing animals, including Royal Bengal tigers. The guide was very knowledgeable and the itinerary was well-organized.

reviews.author: Mary Smith
reviews.comment: This was a great tour, but it was a bit more challenging than I expected. The accommodations were basic, but the food was good and the guide was excellent.

title: Dhaka Tour
description: This 2-day tour will take you to Dhaka, the capital of Bangladesh. You'll visit the Lalbagh Fort, Ahsan Manzil Museum, and other historical sites.

activities: Arrive in Dhaka and check into your hotel.
Visit the Lalbagh Fort and explore its historical significance.
Explore Ahsan Manzil Museum.
Visit the National Museum of Bangladesh.
Explore the Jatiyo Sangsad Bhaban (National Parliament House).
Depart from Dhaka.

reviews.author: Alice Johnson
reviews.comment: Dhaka has a rich history, and this tour covered many important landmarks. The guide was informative, and I enjoyed the cultural experience.

reviews.author: Bob Harris
reviews.comment: Good tour overall. The historical sites were interesting, but Dhaka is a bustling city, and traffic can be challenging.

title: Sylhet Adventure
description: Explore the picturesque landscapes and cultural richness of Sylhet with this 3-day adventure. Visit tea gardens, waterfalls, and historical sites.

activities: Arrive in Sylhet and check into your hotel.
Visit Ratargul Swamp Forest, the only swamp forest in Bangladesh.
Explore Lalakhal, known for its crystal-clear blue water.
Visit Hazrat Shah Jalal University of Science and Technology.
Experience the vibrant Sylhet city nightlife.
Visit the Srimangal tea gardens and experience tea tasting.
Depart from Sylhet.

reviews.author: Ella Davis
reviews.comment: Sylhet is a beautiful region with lush greenery. The tea gardens and Lalakhal were the highlights of this tour.

reviews.author: Samuel Turner
reviews.comment: A great tour! The guide provided interesting insights into the culture of Sylhet, and the itinerary covered a good mix of nature and history.
